BNTouch company corporate website

Visit website

About this project

Project developed as a contructor with the BNTouch company. It is a Wordpress website with its own built theme which helps BNTouch promoting its main product BNTouch CRM, has blog and different request forms.

At this project I worked as a Full-Stack Developer. I was responsible for building markup form scratch, applying it to Wordpress and adding different JavaScript functionality such as jQuery plugins and custom logic behind the forms and the blog.

After it was build I have been continuing to maintain website by creating different landing pages and editing current ones.

Used technologies

  • PHP, Wordpress CMS
  • JavaScript, jQuery
  • Responsive Website Design
  • HTML5 semantic
  • CSS3 + LESS, PostCSS
